custom-sql.sql: SELECT A.[$COLUMN_NAME$] AS myKey, count(A.[$COLUMN_NAME$]) as myValue, B.name as myName FROM inikah_profile A, [$JOIN_TABLE$] B WHERE A.[$COLUMN_NAME$] = B.[$TABLE_PRIM_KEY$] AND bride = ? AND status = ? [$NEXT_CLAUSE$] GROUP BY myKey ORDER BY B.name
